annotations.description: We have seen a great game today, let's hope the players will be able to maintain these high levels of play in order to keep fans entertained in future games. The away team was superior today. The home side was creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks. The tactic of the away side was slow build up play.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Gabriel (Leganes) scores a goal from the resulting free kick, sending it into the top right corner. What a strike that is, absolutely fantastic!

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Neymar (Barcelona) takes the corner kick, but Jon Serantes reads it well and stops the effort.

The resulting free kick from Victor Diaz (Leganes) ends up in the gloves of the keeper.
A clumsy foul by Gerard Pique (Barcelona) and Ricardo de Burgos Bengoetxea blows his whistle.
Wonderful movement by Barcelona. The players are holding possession, mostly exchanging one touch passes. They control the pace of the game now.
Neymar (Barcelona) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
A precise low pass is received by Alexander Szymanowski (Leganes), who makes a yard for himself on the edge of the box, but his poorly placed shot sails well over the bar.
Flag goes up against Neymar (Barcelona) and the referee blows his whistle for offside. The referee blows his whistle for offside.
Diego Rico (Leganes) sends over a cross from the side into the penalty area in order to find one of his teammates, but he fails and the opportunity goes begging.
Ruben Perez (Leganes) trips an opponent with a slide tackle. Ricardo de Burgos Bengoetxea stops the game and he could give him a card, but eventually decides on just a warning.
Barcelona seem to be finding their feet as they enjoy some possession. Great movement by the offensive players allows the defenders to set up the attack.

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! That was a fantastic finish by Rafinha (Barcelona) from just outside the box. He wasted little time in getting away a bullet of a shot that flew past the goalkeeper into the top left corner of the net.
Gooal! No wait, it's been ruled out for offside. Alcacer Paco (Barcelona) disagrees, but the linesman is sure about his call.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Referee Ricardo de Burgos Bengoetxea blows his whistle to start the second half.

Well, a decent first half here. It's certainly not boring, but not the best match either. The away side are dominant and dictating the tempo of the game, mainly because of their higher activity and more accurate passing. The home team tries to find the weakness in the opposition's defence, especially with rapid counter attacks, while the away team play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half of today's match has just finished.
Ricardo de Burgos Bengoetxea couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Rafinha (Barcelona) and blew his whistle.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Luis Suarez feeds Neymar (Barcelona), who taps the ball into an empty net. He makes it 0:3.
Gabriel (Leganes) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
Barcelona are showing great team chemistry. They are passing it around beautifully. Excellent team work.

Jordi Alba (Barcelona) produces an inaccurate low pass into the box that is blocked by the one of the defenders. If this pass had slipped through, the ball would have probably ended up in the back of the net.

Lionel Messi (Barcelona) is picked out by one of his teammates with a brilliant low pass, but he doesn't control the ball well and the defence eliminates the danger without any problem. That should have been a goalscoring opportunity.
Darwin Machis (Leganes) is first to the rebound but his shot is blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition.
